data.message: Armend Shakur , your opinion is appreciated but is very disagreeable. He sells because he is Insanely talented and he moved alot of people with his lyrics and skills. why didn't paul wall or bubba sparks sell as much if its based on skin color ? Because they aren't comparable , like 99% of his competition.  Go buy every single album , listen to every single song and then tell me that him being white is the reason he sales or is great ? If I started rapping do you think that all white people would buy my album because im white ??? ..... No they wouldn't because I suck . im sick of people using the race card to take away his credit.

replies.message: To true but haters will always hate lol
